data.text:
We love sharing photos from our past as reminders of how far we have come through hard work and dedication with the incredible Ethiopian team.
#FlyEthiopian #ThrowbackThursday https://t.co/uaJ96HIFDS

Win marvelous prizes; stadium ticket, air ticket and hotel accommodation for AFCON 2021 to be held in Cameroon. Just play the game here  https://t.co/xyq5u1867m & share it on your social media pages. #FlyEthiopian #AFCON2021 #CAF #AfricanSoccer https://t.co/juAxxYYPf8

Hello from the flight deck! Let’s navigate the skies together.
Thank you @Captain @binyamzemo for sharing.
#FlyEthiopian https://t.co/ZbGayoEGWQ
We have attached the Air waybill or consignment note. https://t.co/lL0AYK8kFH

data.text: Ethiopian was the first African airline to order the Boeing 767, with delivery in early 1980s. By now, these aircraft types are set to be converted to a dedicated cargo freighter at the Ethiopian MRO at Addis. https://t.co/ekKerKHFQM

How Africa’s No. 1 airline avoided layoffs and losses during the pandemic. An interview of Ethiopian Airlines Group CEO Mr. Tewolde GebreMariam with @thepointsguy

Click the link to read the story
https://t.co/Odo9k6L37i https://t.co/PkXxvVJNKP

Ethiopian Airlines has succeeded where many other airlines have struggled, largely due to a strong plan set out in 2010. The Impressive Rise of Ethiopian Airlines article by simple flying. Click on the link to read the story : https://t.co/ANx0kbRn12 https://t.co/FkmgWjQy30

data.text: #Throwback to the first Ethiopian @Olympics gold medalist, #AbebeBikila returning to Addis Ababa with @flyethiopian after the 1st marathon gold medal he won barefoot in the 1960’s Rome Olympic. He also won his 2nd gold medal in 1964,Tokyo Olympic. Wishing the best to the 🇪🇹 team. https://t.co/vhTiWMX32i

In addition to our hotline number 6787 (Int. calls +251 116 179900), use our digital platforms for requests you may have on our services. Chat-bot https://t.co/iQuI1UVIg5 https://t.co/7h1qVGiW7F FB – English https://t.co/vkmivjEx36… FB - Amharic https://t.co/HxgRJ0Y5aN… https://t.co/R67Mitliqw

urls.title: የኢትዮጵያ አየር መንገድ
urls.description: የኢትዮጵያ አየር መንገድ. 527,943 likes · 5,683 talking about this. ይህ የኢትዮጵያ አየር መንገድ ይፋዊ የሃገር ውስጥ የፌስቡክ ገጽ ነው፡፡ ስለጎበኙን እናመሰግናለን! አዳዲስ መረጃዎች እንዲደርስዎት ገጻችንን ላይክ ያድርጉ

data.text: An Order for two DC-6Bs was placed with Douglas Aircraft company as early as December 1956. These four-engined, 71-seat aircraft were used on the long-haul Ethiopian routes. #ThrowbackThursday #FlyEthiopian https://t.co/yGD9Kn3WeP

Experience, skill & knowledge, the best of management & technical expertise accumulated in the airline is one of @flyethiopian success factors. Mr. Tewolde GebreMariam GCEO Ethiopian Airlines interview with @AfricanLM

Watch full interview here -bit.ly/3hP2pvA https://t.co/vjpXWwR9vM

A striking view of the Kilimanjaro mountain in Tanzania. We thank @ aviation_1610 for today's ETmoments. Send us your pictures, tag us using #ETmoments. We will be happy to share them back with you! #FlyEthiopian #WindowViewWednesday https://t.co/hNpHpjpwUy
